get.summary:
ListCollections returns all collections for the authenticated user
Required Permissions:
- read:serverless

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

delete.summary:
DeleteCollection removes a collection by ID
Required Permissions:
- delete:serverless

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description:
ID of the collection to delete (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

put.summary:
Upgrade collection: If current user have paid account, this API will lift the limit of the collection
Required Permissions:
- write:serverless

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description:
ID of the collection to upgrade (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

post.summary:
CreateCollection creates a new collection with the specified configuration
Required Permissions:
- write:serverless

parameters.name: collection.accountId
parameters.description:
Identifier of the account associated with the collection (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

id.description:
Unique identifier for the collection (in GUID format).
This is a read-only field and will be available after a collection is created.

createdAt.description:
Timestamp when the collection was created.
This is a read-only field and will be available after a collection is created.

name.title:
Name of the collection.
This is a required field.
Name can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes

deletedAt.description:
Timestamp when the collection was deleted (or is started to be deleting).
This is a read-only field and will be set after DeleteCollection is called.

cloudProviderId.description:
Cloud provider where the collection is hosted.
Must match one of the provider IDs returned by the `qdrant.cloud.platform.v1.PlatformService.ListCloudProviders` method.
In this case, `hybrid` isn't supported.
After creation, this field cannot be changed.

cloudProviderRegionId.description:
Cloud provider region where the collection is hosted.
Must match one of the region IDs returned by the `qdrant.cloud.platform.v1.PlatformService.ListCloudProviderRegions` method.
After creation, this field cannot be changed.

state.description:
Status of the collection
All fields inside `state` are read-only.

collection.title: Collection represents a vector search collection in the Qdrant serverless environment

CollectionServiceUpgradeCollectionBody.title: Upgrade limits of the specified collection

onDisk.title: Whether to store index on disk vs memory

v1BoolIndexParams.title: BoolIndexParams defines parameters for boolean indexing

v1Collection.title: Collection represents a vector search collection in the Qdrant serverless environment

tenantKey.title: Field name used for tenant isolation

denseVectors.title: Map of dense vector configurations with field name as key

sparseVectors.title: Map of sparse vector configurations with field name as key

v1CollectionConfiguration.title: CollectionConfiguration defines the structure and settings for a collection

url.title: URL to access the qdrant collection (aka serverless database) without port

restPort.title: The port to use for HTTP REST calls (6333)

grpcPort.title: The port to use for gRPC calls (6334)

v1CollectionEndpoint.description:
Endpoint information to access the qdrant collection (aka serverless database).
All fields in this message are a read-only field.

phase.description: The current operational status of the collection.

reason.description:
Descriptive message explaining any errors or issues with the collection.
Empty when the collection is operating normally.

endpoint.description:
The URL endpoint where clients can connect to and interact with the collection.
Not set if the collection is not yet ready or is disabled.

v1CollectionState.description:
CollectionState represents the operational state of a collection in the Qdrant serverless environment.
It provides status information, error details (if any), and endpoint access information.

v1CollectionStatePhase.description:
CollectionStatePhase defines the operational phases of a Qdrant collection.

 - COLLECTION_STATE_PHASE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified phase.
 - COLLECTION_STATE_PHASE_READY: The Collection is fully operational and available for use.
 - COLLECTION_STATE_PHASE_PROCESSING: The Collection is being created, updated, or undergoing maintenance.
 - COLLECTION_STATE_PHASE_DISABLED: The Collection has been temporarily or permanently disabled.

collection.title: Collection represents a vector search collection in the Qdrant serverless environment

v1CreateCollectionResponse.title: CollectionResponse provides details about a created collection

isPrincipal.title: Whether this is a principal field

onDisk.title: Whether to store index on disk vs memory

v1DatetimeIndexParams.title: DatetimeIndexParams defines parameters for datetime indexing

v1DeleteCollectionResponse.title: DeleteCollectionResponse is an empty response for deletion confirmation

dimension.title: The dimensionality of the vector space

distance.title: The distance metric used for vector similarity calculations

multivector.title: Whether to use multi-vector storage for this configuration

rescoring.title: Whether to enable rescoring for search results

storageTier.description: The storage performance tier to use.

precisionTier.description: The precision level for vector operations.

v1DenseVectorConfiguration.title: DenseVectorConfiguration defines the settings for dense vector fields

v1DistanceMetric.description:
DistanceMetric defines the possible distance metrics used in DenseVectorConfiguration.

 - DISTANCE_METRIC_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified distance metric.
 - DISTANCE_METRIC_COSINE: Cosine similarity.
 - DISTANCE_METRIC_EUCLID: Euclidean distance.
 - DISTANCE_METRIC_DOT: Dot product.
 - DISTANCE_METRIC_MANHATTAN: Manhattan distance.

isPrincipal.title: Whether this is a principal field

onDisk.title: Whether to store index on disk vs memory

v1FloatIndexParams.title: FloatIndexParams defines parameters for float indexing

onDisk.title: Whether to store index on disk vs memory

v1GeoIndexParams.title: GeoIndexParams defines parameters for geographical indexing

isPrincipal.title: Whether this is a principal field

onDisk.title: Whether to store index on disk vs memory

v1IntegerIndexParams.title: IntegerIndexParams defines parameters for integer indexing

isTenant.title: Whether this field is used as tenant identifier

onDisk.title: Whether to store index on disk vs memory

v1KeywordIndexParams.title: KeywordIndexParams defines parameters for keyword indexing

collections.title: List of collections with their details

v1ListCollectionsResponse.title: ListCollectionsResponse contains the list of collections

v1PayloadFieldSchema.title: Describes the schema for a payload field

v1PrecisionTier.description:
PrecisionTier defines the level of precision for vector operations.

 - PRECISION_TIER_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified precision level.
 - PRECISION_TIER_LOW: Low precision.
 - PRECISION_TIER_MEDIUM: Medium precision.
 - PRECISION_TIER_HIGH: High precision.

precisionTier.description: The precision level for vector operations.

v1SparseVectorConfiguration.title: SparseVectorConfiguration defines the settings for sparse vector fields

v1StorageTier.description:
StorageTier defines the possible storage performance tiers used in DenseVectorConfiguration.

 - STORAGE_TIER_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified storage tier.
 - STORAGE_TIER_STORAGE: Storage tier.
 - STORAGE_TIER_BALANCED: Balanced tier.
 - STORAGE_TIER_PERFORMANCE: Performance tier.

lowercase.title: Whether to lowercase text before indexing

onDisk.title: Whether to store index on disk vs memory

v1TextIndexParams.title: TextIndexParams defines parameters for text indexing

v1Tokenizer.description:
Tokenizer defines the strategies for tokenizing text during indexing.

 - TOKENIZER_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified tokenizer.
 - TOKENIZER_PREFIX: Prefix tokenizer.
 - TOKENIZER_WHITESPACE: Whitespace tokenizer.
 - TOKENIZER_WORD: Word tokenizer.
 - TOKENIZER_MULTILINGUAL: Multilingual tokenizer.

isTenant.title: Whether this field is used as tenant identifier

onDisk.title: Whether to store index on disk vs memory

v1UuidIndexParams.title: UuidIndexParams defines parameters for UUID indexing

v1VectorModifier.description:
VectorModifier defines the transformations to apply to vectors.

 - VECTOR_MODIFIER_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified modifier.
 - VECTOR_MODIFIER_NONE: No modifications.
 - VECTOR_MODIFIER_IDF: Inverse Document Frequency (IDF).
